properties.areaDesc: Waters from Bonita Beach to Englewood FL out 20 to 60 NM; Coastal waters from Bonita Beach to Englewood FL out 20 NM; Charlotte Harbor and Pine Island Sound
properties.headline: Special Marine Warning issued January 4 at 2:03PM EST until January 4 at 2:30PM EST by NWS Tampa Bay Ruskin FL
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Ruskin has issued a

* Special Marine Warning for...
Charlotte Harbor and Pine Island Sound...
Coastal waters from Bonita Beach to Englewood FL out 20 NM...
Waters from Bonita Beach to Englewood FL out 20 to 60 NM...

* Until 230 PM EST.

* At 202 PM EST, severe thunderstorms capable of producing
waterspouts were located along a line extending from Charlotte
Harbor to near Bonita Beach to 10 nm southwest of L Tower, moving
southeast at 30 knots.

HAZARD...Waterspouts and wind gusts 34 knots or greater.

SOURCE...Radar.

IMPACT...Waterspouts can quickly form and capsize boats, damage
vessels, and create suddenly higher waves. Make sure all
on board are in a secure location and wearing life
jackets. Waterspouts can become tornadoes if they move
onshore. Keep abreast of the situation. Expect wind gusts
in excess of 34 knots, suddenly higher waves, frequent
lightning, and heavy downpours. Make sure all on board
are wearing life jackets.

* Locations impacted include...
Captiva, Sanibel, Fort Myers Beach and Bonita Beach.
